project_abstract.cdata: The Hubei Xiaogan - Xiangfan Highway Project will provide effective, safe, and efficiently managed transport infrastructure, to sustain socioeconomic development, trade, and regional integration in Hubei Province, as well as improve transport links to lagging western provinces. The project components will: 1) increase highway capacity, and regional integration, through capital investments in the construction of the Xiaogan - Xiangfan Expressway (XXE). It will link major industrial, and hub cities, and reach less developed counties in the western, and mountainous part of Hubei, stimulating socioeconomic development; 2) include a rural road improvement program, to facilitate accessibility in low-income areas. This component comprises various subprojects for the rehabilitation, and upgrade of existing road sections. The road selection criteria include county income levels, expected impacts on the population served, consistency with provincial priorities, and, economic rate of return; and, 3) strengthen the capacity, and sustainability of highway management in the Province, by building sector institutions, and facilitating institutional transition to the needs of a market economy. To this end, training programs will be provided for government agencies on highway planning, design, supervision, management and operation, and road safety.

P070441.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>湖北孝感－襄樊公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract> 该项目将支持建设从湖北孝感至襄樊全长 243.5 公里的高速公路，改善通往贫困县的支路，强化湖北省的公路管理能力。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
